job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Looking for motivated frontendmobilefullstack engineers ready to take on the challenge of working for a fastpaced start up We have a very up to date stack that will provide you with experience in a distributed microservice architecture that leverages many top current technologies We are looking for someone who is a big team player and likes to engage in building solutions from beginning to end with the team ltbrgtltbrgtRequired Experienceltbrgt Experience with modern JS frameworks React Angular Vue OR FlutterltbrgtGraphQLltbrgt 2 years of experience building modern webmobile applicationsltbrgt Unit testing e2e testingltbrgt Event driven architectures microservice architectureltbrgtltbrgtBonus Experienceltbrgt Kubernetes Dockerltbrgt AWSltbrgt Cltbrgt Kafka Confluent
